document_data.name: Edwin Carrathal I
document_data.mainbody: '''Edwin Carrathal I''' was High King of [[Callidyrr]] at the turn of the 12{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]]. He was the third son of Queen [[Yolanda Carrathal|Yolanda]] and King [[Bertrand Carrathal|Bertrand]], and his eventual successor was his first daughter, [[Bethany Carrathal|Bethany]]. Her first son and heir was [[Edwin Carrathal II|named in Edwin's honor]].
document_data.History:
Edwin I assumed the throne in the {{YearlinkName|1095}}, following the death of his father.

He ruled for thirty-two years before he died of natural causes in the {{YearlinkName|1127}}.
